configuration.title: Installed Status
configuration.description: Tells if the module is installed or not

configuration.title: Enable UPS Shipping
configuration.description: Do you want to offer UPS shipping?

configuration.title: Tax Class
configuration.description: Use the following tax class on the shipping fee.

configuration.title: Shipping Zone
configuration.description: If a zone is selected, only enable this shipping method for that zone.

configuration.title: Display Order
configuration.description: Display Order. Lowest is displayed first.

configuration.title: UPS Pickup Method
configuration.description: How do you give packages to UPS? CC - Customer Counter, RDP - Daily Pickup, OTP - One Time Pickup, LC - Letter Center, OCA - On Call Air

configuration.title: UPS Packaging?
configuration.description: CP - Your Packaging, ULE - UPS Letter, UT - UPS Tube, UBE - UPS Express Box

configuration.title: Residential Delivery?
configuration.description: Quote for Residential (RES) or Commercial Delivery (COM)

configuration.title: Handling Fee
configuration.description: Handling fee for this shipping method.
